data.name: control_description
data.value: Configurable date picker that enforces fixed or relative date limits.

data.name: prop_selectedDate_description
data.value: Bind to the date-only column that stores the user's selection.

data.name: prop_rangeMode_description
data.value: Choose how the control calculates the minimum and maximum selectable dates.

data.name: prop_rangeMode_optionFixed_displayName
data.value: Set explicit min and max dates

data.name: prop_rangeMode_optionFixed_description
data.value: Use the Minimum Date and Maximum Date inputs to define the range.

data.name: prop_rangeMode_optionRelative_description
data.value: Use the Past Duration and Future Duration inputs to define offsets from today. Weeks automatically align to your first day of the week.

data.name: prop_minDate_description
data.value: Enter the earliest selectable date in ISO format. Only used when Range Mode is set to explicit dates.

data.name: prop_maxDate_description
data.value: Enter the latest selectable date in ISO format. Only used when Range Mode is set to explicit dates.

data.name: prop_pastDuration_description
data.value: Provide how far back from today users can go, using up to four dot-separated numbers: Years.Months.Weeks.Days. Weeks snap to the start of the week using your locale. For example 0.0.1.0 allows dates from the start of this week, while 0.0.2.0 reaches back to the prior week. Only used when Range Mode offsets from today.

data.name: prop_futureDuration_description
data.value: Provide how far ahead from today users can go, using up to four dot-separated numbers: Years.Months.Weeks.Days. Weeks snap to the end of the week using your locale. For example 0.0.1.0 limits selections to the end of this week, while 0.0.2.0 extends through the end of next week. Only used when Range Mode offsets from today.

data.name: prop_disableDays_description
data.value: Select which days should not be available for selection.

data.name: prop_disableDays_optionNone_description
data.value: All days of the week remain selectable.

data.name: prop_disabledDates_description
data.value: Enter a comma-separated list of additional blocked dates in ISO format, for example 2024-08-20,2024-12-25.

data.name: prop_allowTextInput_description
data.value: Permit users to type dates instead of only clicking the picker.

data.name: prop_showMonthOverlay_description
data.value: Display the month selector as a floating overlay when expanded.

data.name: prop_showWeekNumbers_description
data.value: Display ISO week numbers in the calendar view.

data.name: prop_isRequired_description
data.value: Treat an empty selection as invalid and show the required indicator.
